articles.description: Chancellor Rishi Sunak has been accused of "failing to tackle the Tory cost-of-living crisis" as Bank of England boss Andrew Bailey warned inflation pressures may last longer than first thought.
articles.content:
The Banks governor told MPs on the Treasury Select Committee that financial markets now do not expect energy prices to start easing back until the the second half of 2023.
The warning comes with Bri… [+2673 chars]
